mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_notice (title, iuser, ctnt) VALUES (#{title}, ${iuser}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.title, A.ctnt, A.rdt, A.hits , B.nm AS writerNm FROM t_notice A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.inotice = ${inotice}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.inotice, A.title, A.rdt, A.hits, A.ctnt , B.uid, B.nm AS writerNm, B.role FROM t_notice A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser
A.title
A.ctnt
B.nm
LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
